nodes.text: The Kar'a'katok system was a star system located in the galaxy's Core Worlds that contained the planet Kar'a'katok, homeworld of the Shimholt species.
The Kar'a'katok system was established in The Essential Atlas, a reference book written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace and released on August 18, 2009, which placed the system in grid square K-9.
